entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then clearing. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning then light late this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 12 February 2023
